summary: The diff implements a comprehensive AI Quiz Platform frontend with all 17 requirements addressed. All major pages, navigation, design system, mock data, and Recharts integration are present. A few specific acceptance criteria details are uncertain due to file truncation, but overall coverage appears high.

hallucinated_features.description: useActor and useInternetIdentity hooks with full Internet Identity / AuthClient integration are included in the codebase
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'Internet Identity or any real authentication' is a non-goal and 'All authentication is UI-only with mock data'. Including working ICP Internet Identity hooks (useActor.ts, useInternetIdentity.ts, InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the app in main.tsx) goes beyond what was requested.
